channel.title: CVE Feed for ELECOM CO.,LTD. -- WRC-1167GS2-B
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ELECOM CO.,LTD. -- WRC-1167GS2-B

item.title: CVE-2024-25579|2024-08-28T15:17:27.977Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wrc-1167gs2-b
item.description: OS command injection vulnerability in ELECOM wireless LAN routers allows a network-adjacent attacker with an administrative privilege to execute arbitrary OS commands by sending a specially crafted request to the product. Note that WMC-X1800GST-B is also included in e-Mesh Starter Kit "WMC-2LX-B".
